channel.title: Adding Donator Status
channel.description: hi guys does anyone know how to add "You must be a donator to wear this item" like what files i add these to?

item.title: Adding Donator Status
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

I think its added in the server-sided client.java

Here is a sample code what you should add in client.java

if(wearID == (item id) && donator == 0) {
sM("(message)");
return false;
}

Replace (item id) with the item you want to make donor-only
& (message) to what you want to say if the person isn’t donor (eg. You need to be a donator to equip this item)

Read full topic
